about_the_game:
Following the runaway success of Blaston, VR’s biggest dueling competition, streamers and sports fans alike can now view matches from the comfort of their PC with the Blaston Spectator App!

Created with the audience perspective in mind, the Blaston Spectator app gives users access to helpful broadcast tools designed to enhance the viewing experience.

Features:
  • Spectate specific matches using Blaston’s existing room code system
  • Follow an entire Knockout Tournament using the tournament code system
  • Choose from multiple camera angles to follow the action in the best way possible
  • Access broadcast-quality overlays including selected weapons layouts, health statistics and more

Want to be the star of the show as well as a streamer? Be sure to add the full Blaston experience to your Steam Library today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: View and stream Blaston matches with broadcast-quality tools so that your audience never has to miss a moment of the action! Built with streamers and esports fans in mind, Blaston Spectator gives PC owners everything they need to keep an eye on the action of VR’s hottest competitive dueling game.
